name: STRCH Token
description: The first mineable native token on Cardano.STRCH used to participate in the STRCH ecosystem.The goal of $STRCH Mining is to maximize and deeply look at the uses for Proof of Stake, Proof of Work, NFTs and Tokens. This project exists on the edge of the unknown and we intend to use it to test the boundaries of blockchain technology. The Starch Miner is the first native-asset miner on Cardano, utilizing a UTXO sidechain called STARCH-CHAIN it is a Proof of Work blockchain for mining $STRCH. To participate in the system a user must own a STARCH Miner NFT.
